```{r setup}
library(ussie)

```

```{r matches_italy}
matches_italy <- uss_make_matches(engsoccerdata::italy, "Italy")
dplyr::glimpse(matches_italy)
```
Combine
```{r spain and italy data}
matches_spain <- uss_make_matches(engsoccerdata::spain, "Spain")
comb_data<-rbind(matches_italy, matches_spain)
dplyr::glimpse(comb_data)
```
Plot
```{r plotting}
ggplot2::ggplot(comb_data, ggplot2::aes(x = date, y = goals_home, color = country)) + ggplot2::geom_smooth()
```
